channel.title: IlluZive CMS - A new Runescape Website CMS
channel.description:
[ul][list][center][img]http://illuzive-design.com/test/layout/images/logo.png[/img][/center]
Didn't know where to post this so i thought this would be a good place. -NOTE: There is currently no support/integration for any deob as we are working on the CMS part. Deobs will be fully integratable once we start working on that.- -NOTE: PI is currently the only base available to login with its in-game username on the website. This IS JUST for test purpose.- (Updating this thread aswell to make it more appealing :))
[list] [li][iurl=#introduction]Introduction[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#Plan]Feature list(will be updated frequently)[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#UpdateLog]Update log[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#Media]Media[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#support]Supporters[/iurl][/li] [/list]
[s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s] [s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s] [size=1em][b][anchor=introduction]1.0 - Introduction[/anchor][/b][/size] Me and my friend were bored and we decided to code our own CMS for our fun server to test stuff out. Since we don't really do stuff on the server anymore and are quitting the server we would like to bring our CMS we started a couble of days ago to you guys. This is still a project and is not finnished at all. When the CMS is finished you will be able to download it and customize it to your likeings.
[s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s] [size=1em][b][anchor=Plan]Feature list(will be updated frequently)[/anchor][/b][/size] This list will be upldated with suggestions from the community, and own ideas
Log in Login with Server username and password (Only PI supported atm) Account management --------------------------------------- Admincp: Edit Users Add Users Edit Usergroups Change Users Usergroup Edit News slider See All Users Site Stats General settings(site name, site url, timezone, ...) ---------------------------------------- ModCP Full support on normal Pages News system Comments System Server status Highscores Server Information Player Online Vote Page (not sure if you will need to set up yourself) Donate Page (not sure if you will need to set up yourself) Change Password Refer a Friend Create an Account Create account for in-Game Logged Players Status Profiles Install file News feed slider -MORE STUFF WILL BE ADDED-
[s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s] [size=1em][b][anchor=UpdateLog]Update log[/anchor][/b][/size]
[/list][/ul] [code] 29-06-12: Restarted CMS Development -Started first design of the layout (this will change overtime to a more game appearance) -Added login panel + usergroups 30-06-12: Added member.php that shows users and let you view your profile (e.g. member.php?id=1) -Added profiles to member.php -Fixed Register page (still needs design) -Fixed Login + Added "User Menu" when logged in (Profile name, Profile button, Logout button 01-07-12: Added new usergroups + colors and crowns and donator symbol -Added Colors and icon to the Profile name in the User Menu -Fixed member.php also added setting that you can't view the page if you arn't loggd in. -Added support for account log in with your ingame name + password (PI only atm + needs manual set up in your PI server) Thanks to somebody at Mopar (will give propper creds if i remember his name) -Updated Register page to support PI registration (still needs design) 02-07-12: Fixed User Nagigation menu -Added slider -Added first template to the CMS (Will change during development -Re-done security and + fixed lfi and rfi vuln -Started with AdminCP, added double login + extra security to it. -Rewrote how the users and passwords are gathered from the database and how they are protected 04-07-12: Updated AdminCP -Redone slider, made it work with the db, you can now edit the slides from the AdminCP -Added Edit/Create User to the AdminCP -Added Edit Usergroups 11-07-12: Finished AdminCP Layout and coding -Edit News slider Revamped -Redone coding and core to load files -Updated homepage -Recoding Profiles (80%) done [/code]
[s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s] [size=1em][b][anchor=Media]Media[/anchor][/b][/size]
[IMG]http://screensnapr.com/e/ovFEnt.jpg[/img] http://screensnapr.com/e/ovFEnt.jpg
AdminCP (will get some updates soon) [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/VUsA3a.jpg[/img] http://screensnapr.com/e/VUsA3a.jpg
Update slider :) [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/OmlkYT.jpg[/img] http://screensnapr.com/e/OmlkYT.jpg
[img]http://screensnapr.com/e/0iZWCS.jpg[/img] http://screensnapr.com/e/0iZWCS.jpg
[s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s] [size=1em][b][anchor=support]Supporters[/anchor][/b][/size] There is currently no support :(.
-By IlluZive Design-

item.title: IlluZive CMS - A new Runescape Website CMS
item.dc:creator: @TheAmmoBandit TheAmmoBandit
item.description:
@TheAmmoBandit wrote:

[ul][list][center][/center]

Didn’t know where to post this so i thought this would be a good place.
-NOTE: There is currently no support/integration for any deob as we are working on the CMS part. Deobs will be fully integratable once we start working on that.-
-NOTE: PI is currently the only base available to login with its in-game username on the website. This IS JUST for test purpose.-
(Updating this thread aswell to make it more appealing :))

[list]
[li][iurl=#introduction]Introduction[/iurl][/li]
[li][iurl=#Plan]Feature list(will be updated frequently)[/iurl][/li]
[li][iurl=#UpdateLog]Update log[/iurl][/li]
[li][iurl=#Media]Media[/iurl][/li]
[li][iurl=#support]Supporters[/iurl][/li]
[/list]

__________________________________________________________________________
__________________________________________________________________________
[size=1em][anchor=introduction]1.0 - Introduction[/anchor][/size]
Me and my friend were bored and we decided to code our own CMS for our fun server to test stuff out. Since we don’t really do stuff on the server anymore and are quitting the server we would like to bring our CMS we started a couble of days ago to you guys. This is still a project and is not finnished at all. When the CMS is finished you will be able to download it and customize it to your likeings.

__________________________________________________________________________
[size=1em][anchor=Plan]Feature list(will be updated frequently)[/anchor][/size]
This list will be upldated with suggestions from the community, and own ideas

Log in
Login with Server username and password (Only PI supported atm)
Account management

Admincp:
Edit Users
Add Users
Edit Usergroups
Change Users Usergroup
Edit News slider
See All Users
Site Stats
General settings(site name, site url, timezone, …)

ModCP
Full support on normal Pages
News system
Comments System
Server status
Highscores
Server Information
Player Online
Vote Page (not sure if you will need to set up yourself)
Donate Page (not sure if you will need to set up yourself)
Change Password
Refer a Friend
Create an Account
Create account for in-Game
Logged Players Status
Profiles
Install file
News feed slider
-MORE STUFF WILL BE ADDED-

__________________________________________________________________________
[size=1em][anchor=UpdateLog]Update log[/anchor][/size]

[/list][/ul]

29-06-12: Restarted CMS Development
             -Started first design of the layout (this will change overtime to a more game appearance)
             -Added login panel + usergroups
30-06-12: Added member.php that shows users and let you view your profile (e.g. member.php?id=1)
             -Added profiles to member.php
             -Fixed Register page (still needs design) 
             -Fixed Login + Added "User Menu" when logged in (Profile name, Profile button, Logout button
01-07-12: Added new usergroups + colors and crowns and donator symbol
             -Added Colors and icon to the Profile name in the User Menu 
             -Fixed member.php also added setting that you can't view the page if you arn't loggd in.
             -Added support for account log in with your ingame name + password (PI only atm + needs manual set up in your PI server) Thanks to somebody at Mopar (will give propper creds if i remember his name)
             -Updated Register page to support PI registration (still needs design) 
02-07-12: Fixed User Nagigation menu
             -Added slider
             -Added first template to the CMS (Will change during development
             -Re-done security and + fixed lfi and rfi vuln
             -Started with AdminCP, added double login + extra security to it.
             -Rewrote how the users and passwords are gathered from the database and how they are protected
04-07-12: Updated AdminCP
             -Redone slider, made it work with the db, you can now edit the slides from the AdminCP
             -Added Edit/Create User to the AdminCP
             -Added Edit Usergroups 
11-07-12: Finished AdminCP Layout and coding
             -Edit News slider Revamped
             -Redone coding and core to load files
             -Updated homepage
             -Recoding Profiles (80%) done

__________________________________________________________________________
[size=1em][anchor=Media]Media[/anchor][/size]


http://screensnapr.com/e/ovFEnt.jpg

AdminCP (will get some updates soon)

http://screensnapr.com/e/VUsA3a.jpg

Update slider

http://screensnapr.com/e/OmlkYT.jpg


http://screensnapr.com/e/0iZWCS.jpg

__________________________________________________________________________
[size=1em][anchor=support]Supporters[/anchor][/size]
There is currently no support :(.

-By IlluZive Design-

Read full topic
